How many third class engineers on student staff?
How many first class? Does station regularly train people
for first class licenses? For third class?
How many people are the usual minimum for station operation?
Does college operate any television facilities? for student training?
In the last four years, how many staff members do you estimate
have gone
to graduate school in broadcasting
to graduate school in broadcast journalism
to work in commercial radio
to work in noncommercial radio
to work in commercial television
to work in noncommercial television
to work in broadcast advertising
Of present staff, how many are planning a career in broadcasting?
commercial television
commercial radio
noncommercial television
noncommercial radio
broadcast advertising
How many of present staff are currently working part time for local
commercial stations?
